construct_name: MP3 Vision Council Gate Master Construct

global_governance.escalation_policy: Failure at any section -> escalate to supervisor

orchestration_steps.description: Verify ADR record exists with layer_configuration_snapshot and coherence_validation
validation_rules: coherence_validation must show all checks passed

orchestration_steps.description: Verify all 4 quality gates (delivery, response, time, ethical) are configured
validation_rules: Each gate has thresholds and monitoring_rules

orchestration_steps.description: Extract L01-L08 outputs for vision synthesis, noting L07 may be null if human involvement not required
Verify MP1 validation passed and charter context is present
validation_rules: All layer outputs must have MP1 approval stamps

sections.description: Validates the MP2 forward package, extracts layer stack, and prepares intake bundle for vision synthesis. Entry point for MP3 processing.

orchestration_steps.description: Extract L08 scenarios, trend scans, weak signals - the 'what might be'
Extract L04 justice posture and non-negotiable constraints - the 'what must be'
Extract L06 longitudinal data on agency, metacognition, transfer - the 'what is'
Extract MP1 near-term goals, SESOI, equity thresholds - the 'what is now'

sections.description: Fuses the 4 critical input streams (L08 Foresight, L04 Ethics, L06 Outcomes, MP01 Charter) into a unified synthesis context. Performs strategic transduction from high-level signals to actionable constraints.

orchestration_steps.description: Apply 8-priority decision algorithm to synthesis context
process: Evaluate all inputs against justice & dignity criterion first
Only proceed to lower criteria after higher are satisfied
Document any trade-offs with explicit justification
Flag any efficiency gains that could compromise justice

orchestration_steps.description: Generate justice-first mission statement (1-page)
requirements: Must prioritize human dignity and agency

orchestration_steps.description: Define equity as structural invariant, not outcome
orchestration_steps.key_assertion: Equity is not an outcome but a structural invariant
requirements: Define rejection criteria for efficiency models that marginalize

orchestration_steps.description: Generate 6-page narrative with testable implications
narrative_structure: Page 1: Core Mission and Justice Stance
Page 3: Strategic Context and Foresight Alignment
Page 5: Testable Implications and Success Criteria

sections.description: Applies the lexicographic decision calculus to generate the justice-oriented North Star statement, justice stance, and 6-page vision narrative with testable implications.

orchestration_steps.description: Define Near/Mid/Far capability expectations
Extract competencies from L06 (measurable) and L08 (future-needed)

core_competencies.name: Meta-reasoning
core_competencies.descriptor: Plan, monitor, and adapt one's own reasoning strategies, particularly when interacting with AI systems

core_competencies.name: Ethical Deliberation
core_competencies.descriptor: Identify stakeholders, weigh conflicting values, and reason transparently about socio-technical trade-offs

core_competencies.name: Collaborative Problem-Framing
core_competencies.descriptor: Co-define complex, ambiguous problems with diverse human and AI partners; negotiate shared goals and constraints

core_competencies.name: Contextual Innovation
core_competencies.descriptor: Apply and adapt technical/scientific principles to solve local problems, leveraging indigenous knowledge and low-resource constraints

orchestration_steps.ai_complementarity: Prioritize skills where humans, working with AI, create more value than either alone

orchestration_steps.description: Map competencies to supporting layers

layer_mappings.L02: Build technical operators that support competencies
layer_mappings.L05: Create interfaces that render competencies accessible
layer_mappings.L06: Develop valid and fair methods for assessing competencies

orchestration_steps.description: Align lattice with NDP 2030 and RISDP 2020-2030 strategic goals

NDP_2030: Improving educational outcomes in science and mathematics
Developing skills to reduce inequality and unemployment
RISDP_2020_2030: Development of human and social capital
Science, technology, and skills development for regional competitiveness

orchestration_steps.decolonial_action: Populate far horizon with competencies strategically vital for SADC region's future autonomy, resilience, and prosperity

sections.description: Generates the Horizon Competency Lattice defining AI-complementary human capabilities across Near (1-2y), Mid (3-5y), and Far (6-15y) horizons, contextualized for SADC region.

orchestration_steps.description: Define 3-5 strategic investment areas aligned with L08 scenarios
requirements: Each bet must align with specific L08 scenario
Bets must collectively cover near, mid, and far horizons
Portfolio must be balanced across risk profiles

orchestration_steps.description: Define explicit success conditions and kill conditions for each bet

success_criteria: Must align with competency lattice goals
kill_criteria: Explicit conditions that would terminate the bet

orchestration_steps.description: Ensure each bet has explicit equity protections
requirements: Every bet must have at least one equity safeguard
Safeguards must reference charter equity thresholds
Safeguards must be enforceable via L04

orchestration_steps.description: Record deprioritized alternatives and explicit rationale for not choosing them

counterfactual_accountability.description: For every major strategic shift, specify which alternative futures are being deprioritized and why
counterfactual_accountability.purpose: Enables future Vision Councils to understand original rationale and make informed pivots

orchestration_steps.organizational_learning: Transforms decision-making from isolated events into continuous learning conversation with organization's strategic history

sections.description: Formulates portfolio of 3-5 strategic investment areas with explicit success/kill criteria, equity safeguards, and counterfactual accountability documenting deprioritized alternatives.

orchestration_steps.description: Generate rationale-first tenets that provide direct guidance to L2 and L5
principle_requirements: Rationale MUST come before rule statement
Must trace to North Star or specific bet

example_principles.name: Rationale-First UX
example_principles.rationale: Enables learner agency by making system reasoning transparent

example_principles.name: Explainability-by-Design
example_principles.statement: All adaptive decisions must be accompanied by machine-readable and human-legible rationale
example_principles.rationale: Builds trust and supports metacognitive development

example_principles.name: Multi-Path Mastery
example_principles.statement: Learning pathways must offer multiple valid routes to competency
example_principles.rationale: Respects learner diversity and prevents single-track optimization

example_principles.name: Equity Defaults
example_principles.statement: Default settings must benefit SESOI populations
example_principles.rationale: Counteracts systemic drift toward majority optimization

orchestration_steps.description: Assign each principle to specific target layers

layer_obligations.L1: Re-weight pedagogy toward horizon competencies per principles
layer_obligations.L2: Encode principles into operators/flags; expose audit hooks
layer_obligations.L5: Render explanations; support multiple paths per principles

orchestration_steps.description: Identify practices to deprecate because they no longer serve the renewed vision
detection_criteria: Practice conflicts with North Star justice stance
Practice optimizes for metrics that erode long-term competencies
Practice creates vendor lock-in or equity barriers

orchestration_steps.description: Define Immediate/Gradual/Long-term deprecation horizons

Immediate.criteria: Practice causes active harm or equity violation

Gradual.criteria: Practice is suboptimal but not harmful; replacement available

Long-term.criteria: Practice is legacy but deeply embedded; requires significant migration

sections.description: Generates Vision-to-Design Principles (rationale-first tenets for L2, L5) and Sunset Signals identifying practices to deprecate with explicit timelines.

orchestration_steps.description: Verify near-term gains don't erode long-term competencies
validation_logic: Compare each near-horizon bet against far-horizon competencies
Flag any bet that could reduce capacity for far-horizon competency development
Check that near-term optimizations don't create path dependencies that limit future options

orchestration_steps.description: Verify foresight horizon >= vision horizon
validation_logic: L08 foresight must project at least as far as vision far horizon (6-15y)
L08 scenarios must support each strategic bet
Weak signals must be compatible with vision direction

orchestration_steps.description: Verify every lattice competency is measurable by L06
validation_logic: Each competency in lattice must have corresponding L06 measurement capability
L06 must be able to detect regression on long-term competencies
Assessment methods must be fair across equity strata

orchestration_steps.description: Verify each principle's target layers have capacity to implement
validation_logic: For each principle, check target layer has required capabilities
For each competency, check supporting layers can deliver
Identify any capacity gaps that would prevent vision realization

sections.description: Validates vision coherence with layer capabilities using Time-Consistency Rule and No-Myopia Guard. Ensures near-term gains don't erode long-term competencies.

orchestration_steps.description: Determine FORWARD_TO_MP4 or EMIT_DIRECTIVE_BUNDLE based on coherence result
Create machine-readable policy tags for CI/CD enforcement

vision_tag_schema.north_star_id: Unique ID of the North Star
vision_tag_schema.principle_id: Specific principle this tag relates to
vision_tag_schema.charter_hash: Cryptographic hash of governing Charter (from MP1)
vision_tag_schema.policy_hash: Cryptographic hash of governing Policy (from L4)
vision_tag_schema.sunset_signal: Reference to applicable sunset signal if any

automated_enforcement.description: Tags enable CI/CD pipeline gates to validate strategic compliance
validations: policy_hash matches currently active L4 policy
Code commits include valid Vision Tag

orchestration_steps.description: Link all vision artifacts to source inputs for full provenance
Record complete execution trace, SLO compliance, and governance attestation

audit_record.lexicographic_attestation: Declaration that calculus was applied correctly

sections.description: Packages vision artifacts for MP4 or issues DIRECTIVE_BUNDLE to Layer Agents when vision-capability gaps exist. Generates machine-readable Vision Tags for CI/CD enforcement.
